name: Sous Chef (TRIJAM)
description:
Made for Trijam #188
Theme: Sabotage

You own a local restaurant, and you used to be the best-earning in town. But recently, another restaurant popped up down the street, stealing all of your customers! One day, looking at an empty dining area, you decide to become a sous chef and take down the competing restaurant from the inside.
Find ways to ruin the other restaurant's meals. Maybe you'll drive their ratings down enough to bring the town back to your restaurant.

PROJECT IS INCOMPLETE. I will continue to work on this, but I had to get a version submitted for Trijam.

FULL DEMO (unreleased): https://syntax-studios.itch.io/sous-chef-demo

Known bugs:
The "replay" button breaks the game. This will be fixed in the next version.
The sound for picking up items does not play. This was a bug while building the game (I was on a tight schedule), I’ll fix this as soon as I can. 
Sot109 - The dialogue box doesn't disappear at the end or in between when the chef leaves

"Kitchen and more - RPG tileset (16x16)" made by LimeZu. CC-BY 4.0 - https://limezu.itch.io/kitchen

"16x16 food" made by ARoachIFoundOnMyPillow. CC0 1.0 - https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-food

"Chef [Animated] - Classic Hero Edit" made by Umz. CC0 1.0 - https://opengameart.org/content/chef-animated-classic-hero-edit
